meanings.definition: The skill or technique of drawing accurately and precisely.
meanings.sent1: Her draftsmanship improved after taking art classes.
meanings.sent2: Architects rely on good draftsmanship to create detailed building plans.
meanings.sent3: The robot's attempt at draftsmanship resulted in a stick figure drawing.
meanings.sent4: His draftsmanship was like a finely tuned instrument, creating intricate designs effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The art teacher praised her draftsmanship, noting the attention to detail in her sketches.

meanings.definition: The quality of being a skilled draftsman.
meanings.sent1: His impressive draftsmanship was evident in every architectural drawing.
meanings.sent2: The award recognized his exceptional draftsmanship in the field of illustration.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed off its draftsmanship by drawing in the spilled flour on the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent4: Her draftsmanship shone through in the precise lines and shading of her portrait.
meanings.sent5: The old master's draftsmanship was legendary, inspiring generations of artists.
